OGENext.title: About OGE Next
texts: OGE Next is an open-source software that allows you to access your school's online gradebook and average from OGE.
OGE Next was programmed by %s, is written in Python, uses PySide 6 for the interface and is available for Windows, MacOS and Linux.
Logo idea and design by %s, realization by %s.
Thanks to %s for the help with BeautifulSoup and regex.
Go to the %s for more information.
